title: Blended Learning-Based Social Studies Curriculum Design Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Long-term training program for elementary teachers to enhance blended learning model development. Focus on designing field-applicable ISD models

learning_goals: In blended learning design, optimal online/offline activities can be combined according to learning objectives and situational contexts
A protocol can be applied to validate the effectiveness of blended learning models by analyzing formative assessment data
The blended learning design model can be iteratively improved through expert review and field testing
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
